title: Lowest Methane Emissions from Transport
description: In 2023, Dominica recorded one of the lowest methane emissions from transport, with a value of 0.0001 Mt CO2e.

title: Lowest Carbon Dioxide Emissions from Waste
description: Dominica had one of the lowest carbon dioxide emissions from waste in 2023, with a value of 0.0001 Mt CO2e.

title: Lowest Nitrous Oxide Emissions from Transport
description: In 2023, Dominica achieved one of the lowest nitrous oxide emissions from transport, with a value of 0.0003 Mt CO2e.

title: Lowest Net National Savings
description: In 2018, Dominica had one of the lowest adjusted net national savings, at -25.30% of GNI.
